product_name: REI Rainwall Rain Jacket - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The toddler girls' REI Rainwall Rain Jacket offers waterproof, windproof protection for active little ones in the outdoors. Ripstop nylon shell is waterproof and windproof to 60+ mph; seams are sealed to complete the protection. 3-panel hood has a rain brim, rip-and-stick adjustment tab in back and elastic on the sides of the opening for a comfortable fit; hood stows in the collar when not needed. Elastic cuffs and front stormflap seal out the elements; dropped tail extends coverage. Zippered hand pockets secure essentials. Tricot-lined collar is warm and soft. The toddler girls' REI Rainwall Rain Jacket has a locker loop and a write-on ID label inside.
short_description: The toddler girls' REI Rainwall Rain Jacket offers waterproof, windproof protection for active little ones in the outdoors.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
